title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document the requirements for the CodeMemoryTrainer application. This includes defining the target audience, key features, desired user experience, data storage and retrieval needs (e.g., database schema design), scalability and performance considerations, security and privacy requirements (e.g., user authentication, data encryption), integration with external resources such as coding tutorials, documentation, APIs, etc., and creating a roadmap for the project's development phases.

Please note that this task requires input from various roles including code-architect, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and interaction between different modules.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to store user data, coding patterns, and other relevant information.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend functionality, including user authentication, data management, and integration with the spaced repetition algorithm.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Design and implement the user interface for the CodeMemoryTrainer application, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.

title: Implement Spaced Repetition Algorithm
description: Research and implement an effective spaced repetition algorithm to optimize the learning process for coding patterns and concepts.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the CodeMemoryTrainer application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CodeMemoryTrainer application, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance instructions.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform security audits to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the CodeMemoryTrainer application.

title: Perform Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of the CodeMemoryTrainer application.
